Package org.apache.heron.metricsmgr.sink.metricscache

Class MetricsCacheClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.common.network.HeronClient
      • org.apache.heron.metricsmgr.sink.metricscache.MetricsCacheClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ISelectHandler
    public class MetricsCacheClient
extends HeronClient
implements java.lang.Runnable
    MetricsCacheClient connects to MetricsCache and then send TopologyManager.PublishMetrics continuously. Note that MetricsCache will not send registerRequest or wait for registerResponse.

    • Field Summary

        s - the NIOLooper bind with this socket client
        host - the host of remote endpoint to communicate with

        publishMetricsCommunicator - the queue to read PublishMetrics from and send to MetricsCache
